original_text: Two women will be preparing food together in the same place. God will take one of them away, but he will leave the other woman behind.
korean_text: 두 여자가 맷돌질을 하고 있으매 한 사람은 데려가고 한 사람은 버려둠을 당할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Two women will be preparing food together
sentences.korean_translation: 두 여자가 함께 음식을 준비하고 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God will take one of them away
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들 중 한 사람을 데려가실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but he will leave the other woman behind
